data.what_is: Six Degrees is a Public Relations company offering communication solutions to organizations and individuals across industries.
data.product_description: Six Degrees is a Public Relations company offering communication solutions to organizations and individuals across industries.

initial_reviews.review_title: 6 Degrees PR is a competent public relations firm
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 6 Degrees PR?
strong reputation for delivering effective PR solutions for their clients

What do you dislike about 6 Degrees PR?
some potential clients may find their pricing to be higher than other PR firms in the industry

Recommendations to others considering 6 Degrees PR:
Research their services and experience to ensure that they are a good fit for your business's PR needs.
Request case studies or references from previous clients to get a better understanding of their track record and the results they have achieved.
Be aware of their pricing structure and ensure that it aligns with your budget and expectations.
Communicate openly with their team about your goals and expectations for your PR campaign.
Collaborate closely with their team to develop a customized strategy that is tailored to your specific needs and goals.

What problems is 6 Degrees PR solving and how is that benefiting you?
6 Degrees PR is solving the problem of helping businesses and organizations improve their public image and reputation through strategic PR campaigns, media relations, and crisis management

initial_reviews.review_title: Easy to use, highly effective communications software
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 6 Degrees PR helped with:
This is probably the most effective communications consulting team I've ever used, and I've been working in PR for 10 years. The software is all about the important stuff, relationships. You can connect with media reporters and producers easily and really meet the needs of your audience through things that grab their interest. You will be able to create meaningful outreach opportunities to talk about whatever issues are close to your heart, and 6 Degrees will help you be successful.

What do you like best about 6 Degrees PR?
I like that I have the ability to connect with a variety of people in the media industry - not just writers, but also editors and producers. The variety helps me create a more balanced outreach and makes the product come together through a much cleaner, simpler process.

What do you dislike about 6 Degrees PR?
I really don't "dislike" anything about 6 Degrees, but I do think that there is ALWAYS room for improvement. The company certainly can continue growing and expanding the amount of media resources they provide access to, and they could also make users aware of any new changes through a newsletter so that things continue running smoothly and it remains easy to use.

Recommendations to others considering 6 Degrees PR:
I would just say to jump right in! Give them a call and explain what you're looking for. They are helpful and will be able to direct your needs to their professionals.

Describe the project or task 6 Degrees PR helped with:
I was working on an opinion article for my company and they helped out majorly.

What do you like best about 6 Degrees PR?
Most approachable senior leadership team.
Great work-life balance.
Freedom to work and no hierarchy.

What do you dislike about 6 Degrees PR?
Major emphasis on Technology PR, which wasn't very conducive for an agency just setting up it roots and competing with some of the larger and more established players in the market

Describe the project or task 6 Degrees PR helped with:
Easy to manage. Reccomend 100.% for marketing

What do you like best about 6 Degrees PR?
Simplicity, easy to manage. Not hard to figure out

What do you dislike about 6 Degrees PR?
Email ads. Email marketing digital analytics

Recommendations to others considering 6 Degrees PR:
Patience
